title: GigMarket landing website with 5 dashboard pages

requirements.summary: Create hero section with app branding, CTAs, and worker illustration
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'GigMarket' as the app name
Tagline 'Hire trusted local workers easily' is visible
Two CTA buttons are present: 'Download APK' and 'Get Started'
Visual element represents workers from construction, factory, and school staff categories

file_operations.description: Create hero section component with GigMarket branding, tagline 'Hire trusted local workers easily', two CTA buttons ('Download APK' and 'Get Started'), and integrate the generated hero illustration image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-workers.dim_1200x600.png

requirements.summary: Create How It Works section with 4-step process flow
acceptanceCriteria: Section displays four sequential steps
Steps are labeled: 'Post a job', 'Workers apply', 'Hire instantly', 'Track status'
Visual flow shows the process clearly

file_operations.description: Create How It Works section component displaying 4 sequential steps: Post a job, Workers apply, Hire instantly, Track status. Use card-based layout with icons and visual flow indicators

requirements.summary: Create Features section highlighting 5 key platform capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Features section displays all 5 features
Each feature has a clear label and icon
Layout is visually balanced and scannable

file_operations.description: Create Features section component displaying 5 key features: Verified workers, Location based hiring, Quick hiring, Ratings & reviews, Multi-category workers. Use icon cards in a balanced grid layout

requirements.summary: Create 5 navigation cards linking to separate dashboard pages
acceptanceCriteria: Five clickable cards are displayed on the landing page
Cards are labeled: 'About Application', 'User Manual', 'Review Centre', 'Complaint Box', 'Download APK'
Each card navigates to its corresponding dashboard page
Cards use consistent styling with icons

file_operations.description: Create navigation cards component with 5 clickable cards linking to dashboard pages: About Application, User Manual, Review Centre, Complaint Box, Download APK. Use consistent card styling with icons and wire navigation using React Router Link components

requirements.summary: Create About Application dashboard page with mission, benefits, and project info
acceptanceCriteria: Separate page/route exists for About Application
Page contains sections for mission, problem statement, target users, benefits, screenshots placeholder, and founder info
Content is organized with clear headings
Page is accessible via the About Application navigation card

file_operations.description: Create About Application dashboard page with sections for app mission, problem statement, target users (workers + employers), benefits, and founder/project info. Include screenshot placeholder using frontend/public/assets/generated/app-screenshot-1.dim_400x800.png. Populate with realistic dummy data

requirements.summary: Create User Manual dashboard page with step-by-step guides and FAQ
acceptanceCriteria: Separate page/route exists for User Manual
Page includes sections for account creation, job posting, worker application, hiring, and safety tips
FAQ section uses accordion UI pattern
Step-by-step instructions use card-based layout
Page is accessible via the User Manual navigation card

file_operations.description: Create User Manual dashboard page with sections for account creation, job posting, worker application process, hiring process, and safety tips using step card UI. Include FAQ accordion section with common questions. Populate with dummy instructional content

requirements.summary: Create Review Centre dashboard page with ratings, filters, and review form
acceptanceCriteria: Separate page/route exists for Review Centre
Page displays ratings summary with star visualization
Review cards are displayed with dummy data
Filter controls allow switching between worker and employer views
Form allows users to write new reviews
Demo analytics chart visualizes review data
Page is accessible via the Review Centre navigation card

file_operations.description: Create Review Centre dashboard page with ratings summary (star visualization), review cards with dummy data, filter options (worker/employer), write review form, and demo analytics chart. Use cards for individual reviews and populate with realistic sample reviews

requirements.summary: Create Complaint Box dashboard page with official complaint handling UI
acceptanceCriteria: Separate page/route exists for Complaint Box
Form includes category dropdown and file upload capability
Ticket status UI shows complaint progress
Previous complaints are listed with status indicators
Design conveys trust and official handling
Page is accessible via the Complaint Box navigation card

file_operations.description: Create Complaint Box dashboard page with complaint form (category dropdown, file upload for proof), ticket status UI, and previous complaints list with status indicators. Use official and trust-focused design language. Populate with sample complaint data

requirements.summary: Create Download APK dashboard page with installation guidance and screenshots
acceptanceCriteria: Separate page/route exists for Download APK
Prominent APK download button is displayed as primary CTA
Version information is shown
Screenshots carousel displays app screens
Installation steps are provided in clear sequence
Section indicates Play Store availability is coming soon
Page is accessible via the Download APK navigation card

file_operations.description: Create Download APK dashboard page with prominent APK download button as primary CTA, version info, app screenshots carousel using frontend/public/assets/generated/app-screenshot-2.dim_400x800.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/app-screenshot-3.dim_400x800.png, installation steps, and 'Coming soon on Play Store' section

requirements.summary: Create stats section displaying workers onboarded and jobs posted metrics
acceptanceCriteria: Stats section is visible on landing page
Displays worker count metric
Displays jobs posted metric
Numbers are prominently featured with labels

file_operations.description: Create stats section component showing metrics for workers onboarded and jobs posted with prominent numerical highlights and labels. Use dummy data for demo purposes

requirements.summary: Create trust badges section to establish platform credibility
acceptanceCriteria: Trust badges section is visible on landing page
Displays credibility indicators or trust symbols
Badges are visually distinct and recognizable

file_operations.description: Create trust badges section component displaying credibility indicators using generated trust badge images: frontend/public/assets/generated/trust-badge-1.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/trust-badge-2.dim_128x128.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/trust-badge-3.dim_128x128.png. Make badges visually distinct and professional

requirements.summary: Create testimonials section with user feedback cards
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section is present on landing page
Displays multiple testimonial cards with dummy data
Each testimonial includes user type (worker/employer) indication

file_operations.description: Create testimonials section component with user feedback cards. Display multiple testimonials with dummy data indicating user type (worker/employer). Use card-based layout with quotes and user details

requirements.summary: Create worker categories grid displaying 7 job categories with icons
acceptanceCriteria: Grid displays all 7 worker categories: factory work, school staff, construction labor, helpers, drivers, cleaners, technicians
Each category has a distinct icon
Grid is responsive and visually organized
Categories are clearly labeled

file_operations.description: Create worker categories grid component displaying 7 categories with icons: factory work (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-factory.dim_96x96.png), school staff (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-school.dim_96x96.png), construction labor (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-construction.dim_96x96.png), helpers (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-helpers.dim_96x96.png), drivers (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-drivers.dim_96x96.png), cleaners (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-cleaners.dim_96x96.png), and technicians (frontend/public/assets/generated/category-technicians.dim_96x96.png). Use responsive grid layout with clear labels

requirements.summary: Create call to action footer with engagement CTAs
acceptanceCriteria: Footer section contains prominent call-to-action elements
CTAs align with main user goals (download/get started)
Footer is present on landing page

file_operations.description: Create call to action footer component with prominent CTAs encouraging user engagement. Align CTAs with main user goals (Download APK, Get Started). Use compelling copy and button styling

requirements.summary: Implement client-side routing for landing page and 5 dashboard pages
acceptanceCriteria: React Router or similar routing solution is configured
Landing page is accessible at root route
Each dashboard has a unique route
Navigation between pages works without page reload
Browser back/forward buttons work correctly

file_operations.description: Configure React Router with routes for landing page (root), About Application (/about), User Manual (/manual), Review Centre (/reviews), Complaint Box (/complaints), and Download APK (/download). Wire up all page components to their respective routes

Create landing page component that composes all landing page sections: HeroSection, HowItWorksSection, FeaturesSection, NavigationCards, StatsSection, TrustBadgesSection, TestimonialsSection, WorkerCategoriesGrid, and CTAFooter. This serves as the root route

requirements.summary: Apply modern startup UI design system with trust colors and mobile-first layout
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses soft shadows and rounded corners throughout
Color scheme incorporates blue and green as primary trust colors
Typography uses clear, accessible fonts suitable for low-tech users
Layout is mobile-first and responsive across devices
CTAs are prominent and easy to identify
Icons are used consistently for categories and features
Overall design conveys professionalism and trustworthiness

file_operations.description: Define global design system with trust colors (blue and green as CSS custom properties), accessible font families for low-tech users, soft shadow utilities, and rounded corner standards. Set base typography scale and mobile-first responsive breakpoints

Configure Tailwind theme with trust colors (blue and green shades), rounded corner utilities, soft shadow scales, accessible font stacks, and mobile-first breakpoints. Extend theme to support modern startup UI aesthetic with professional and trustworthy design tokens

requirements.summary: Populate all sections with realistic dummy data for demo readiness
acceptanceCriteria: All dashboard pages display realistic dummy content
Review cards show sample reviews
Complaint box shows example complaints
Stats show realistic numbers
Testimonials use believable worker/employer quotes
Website is fully navigable and presentable for demo purposes

file_operations.description: Create centralized dummy data module containing realistic sample data for reviews (with ratings, worker/employer attribution), complaints (with categories and statuses), statistics (worker counts, job counts), testimonials (with worker/employer quotes), user manual FAQ items, and about page content. Make data demo-ready and believable
